title: Nebula Floater
summaries: The Nebula Floater is a Hardmode, post-Lunatic Cultist flying enemy that spawns in the area of the Nebula Pillar during the Lunar Events. The Nebula Floater periodically spawns up to three Nebula Eyes that float around it. If it has a clear line of sight to the player, it will hover in place and start firing pink Nebula Lasers from one of the Nebula Eyes at the player, otherwise, it will move towards the player through all tiles. It can also do random teleports around the player periodically, and will also attempt to do so with a small chance if it is hit.

statistics.Damage:
75/150/225 (contact)
130200300 (Nebula Laser)
statistics.Max Life: 1300/2600/3900
statistics.KB Resist: 50%/55%/60%
